author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: BCH Retail Investment Pte Ltd v Chief Assessor
counsel: David de Souza and Jeanette Lee (De Souza Tay & Goh) for the appellant; Foo Hui Min and Joyce Chee (Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Revenue Law/Property tax/Annual value/Whether owner of shopping centre entitled to deduct all reasonable advertising and promotional expenses from gross rental paid by tenants for purpose of ascertaining annual value of shopping centre
